member.name: T:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests
member.summary: Contains unit tests for the class.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Add_PositiveIntegers_ReturnsSum
member.summary: Tests that adding two positive integers returns the correct sum.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Add_NegativeIntegers_ReturnsSum
member.summary: Tests that adding two negative integers returns the correct sum.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Add_PositiveAndNegative_ReturnsSum
member.summary: Tests that adding a positive and a negative integer returns the correct sum.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Add_NumberAndZero_ReturnsSameNumber
member.summary: Tests that adding zero to a number returns the same number.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Add_ZeroAndZero_ReturnsZero
member.summary: Tests that adding zero to zero returns zero.
